dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land of Eridoria lies in ruin. The once great kingdom is now divided into five warring states.

dialogues.speaker: Lyra
dialogues.text: I've had enough of this war! I'm leaving to find a way to restore magic to our world.

dialogues.speaker: Arin
dialogues.text: You can't just leave, Lyra. You're one of the few skilled warriors we have left. We need you here to protect our state.

dialogues.speaker: Lyra
dialogues.text: Protect it from what? The other states are just as weak as we are. There's no point in fighting over scraps when the real problem is the lack of magic.

dialogues.speaker: Arin
dialogues.text: I understand your concerns, but you can't just give up on our state. We need people like you to help us rebuild.
